Articles.Content:
Just a quick one here:- did something change with the tracking station in career mode? I've upgraded it to level 2 and still can't use manoeuvre nodes, is this intended? I seriously hope it isn't.

Only mods installed are KER, BDarmoury and Hyperedit.
Flight planning also requires a teir2 Mission control
Bugger me, look like the budget's taking another hit! Thanks for the quick reponse!
